alert.note: Alert for Hemphill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:27AM CDT until July 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR LIPSCOMB AND NORTHEASTERN HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 427 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Higgins, or 12 miles west of Arnett, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Follett, Higgins, Glazier and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
